name: Not-Breakout
description:
It's not that break*ut or arkan*id game! :p

Not-Breakout is an easy, simple but addictive, casual game where you just simply don't let the ball fell by controlling the plane below. With customizable, aesthetic-color scheme, you will never get bored!

This is a web version with no ads (because i don't know how to implement it, lol). So, consider supporting by donating, but it's okay if you don't want to. ;)

*Full screen recommended
